wikipedia_page.main: Alexander Edwin Michael Keeping (22 August 1902 – 28 March 1984) was an English footballer and manager. He coached Real Madrid CF from January 1948 to October 1950. His father was the Olympic medal winning cyclist Frederick Keeping.

response: His son was Michael Keeping, who played football for Southampton and Fulham and became manager of Real Madrid in Spain.
